open-ended.question: What event is considered a prelude to the meltdown of the investment banking industry?
When did the global financial crisis occur?
open-ended.answer: The global financial crisis occurred in 2023.

open-ended.question: What did Credit Suisse cease using in January 2024?
open-ended.answer: In January 2024, UBS ceased using the Credit Suisse name.

open-ended.question: What is the main difference between the causes of the 2008 financial crisis and the current situation?
open-ended.answer: The main difference is that the 2008 crisis was caused by worthless assets due to sub-prime loans (CDOs), while the current situation seems to involve a liquidity crunch on a zombie bank.

open-ended.question: What movie is mentioned as a reference to the current financial situation?
open-ended.answer: The movie "Too Big to Fail" is mentioned as a reference to the current financial situation.

open-ended.question: What type of asset is considered toxic in the current financial crisis?
open-ended.answer: 10-year Treasuries are considered the toxic asset in this crisis.

open-ended.question: What did Warren Buffet do in 2008 regarding bailing out banks?
open-ended.answer: In 2008, Warren Buffet declined to help bail out banks because he saw what was coming.

open-ended.question: What was one reason the 2008 financial crisis occurred?
open-ended.answer: One reason the 2008 financial crisis occurred was because banks were loaning 4x values on homes.

open-ended.question: What is one way the Fed is responding to the current financial situation?
open-ended.answer: The Fed is trying to contain the situation by pulling all the stops.

open-ended.question: When is the speculated true collapse of the financial system?
open-ended.answer: The speculated true collapse is in March 2024.

binary.question: Did the collapse of Credit Suisse lead to a meltdown in the investment banking industry? Answer with Yes or No.
Is the current financial situation exactly the same as the 2008 financial crisis? Answer with Yes or No.
Did the 2008 financial crisis have prior experience to guide them through the events? Answer with Yes or No.
Is the 2023 global financial crisis caused by worthless assets in the form of CDOs? Answer with Yes or No.
Did Warren Buffet help bail out banks in 2008? Answer with Yes or No.
Are 10-year Treasuries considered toxic assets in the current financial crisis? Answer with Yes or No.
Is the strong job market mentioned as a factor that differentiates the current situation from the 2008 crisis? Answer with Yes or No.
Is the current financial crisis caused by a liquidity crunch on a zombie bank rather than rotten and worthless MBS assets? Answer with Yes or No.
